PINKY_SESSION.description: Qr.Js ile oluşturduğunuz özel session kodu. Type here yours Asena Session.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: only en & ml language is available

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

STICKER_REPLY.description: if you need Automatic sticker reply type'true'. Otherwise false

THERI_KICK_GP.description: will remove members from group if they use bad words given in THERI_LIST_GP , if true

NUMBER.description: give your orginal phone number if you wish to add it in .number cmnd

THERI_KICK_PM.description: will block members if they use bad words given in THERI_LIST_PM , if true

THERI_LIST_GP.description: enter the word you dont allow in your group

THERI_LIST_PM.description: enter the words you dont allow in your pm

OWNER_NAME.description: reply for .owner ! give your details, Use => default, to change back.

Z_PINKY_AI.description: turn on chat back auto reply pinky (use true to on and fale to off)

Z_BOT_NAME.description: give a name you disire to give your bot (for auto reply pinky to identify)

Z_DEP_NAME.description: bot deployer name make it short  (for auto reply pinky to identify)

Z_DEP_REPLY.description: enter the reply message you want when deployer name is typed by users  (for auto reply pink to identify)
Z_DEP_REPLY.value: i know him he is my creator

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

NO_LOG.description: Hata logu görmek istemiyorsanız true yapın. Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Görüldü atmak istiyorsanız true yazın. Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by pinky bot

HEROKU.description: Herokuda çalışıyorsa true yazın. If it is running in Heroku, type true.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Kişilerin Özel Chat Te Botu Kullanmasını Engeller Örn:905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

WORK_TYPE.description: Dark'S  Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot. and if you use “admin”, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Herokuda uygulama adı. Heroku APP Name.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

CHANGE_BGM_TO.description: Dont leave this blank choose the bgm you need - enter one or two

TAG_REPLY.description: Metioned örnek olduğunda sesli yanıt alabilmek için numaranızın jidini girin- 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

NO_ONLINE.description: Çevrimiçi görünmek istemiyorsanız true yazın. Type true if you don't want to appear online.
